title: "30 financial institutions now bank on the cloud–Diokno"
excerpt: "Governor Benjamin E. Diokno said more banks are moving towards “cloud-based” technology as digitalization continues to gain traction in the industry. Diokno said about 30 financial institutions (FIs) have transitioned towards hosting their core banking solutions in the cloud as of end-March this year."
